issue.title: setup.sh doesn't allow use of a ros overlay and drcsim at the same time

content.raw: We have actually created our own setup.sh script that does all the work of the drcsim script as well as some project-specific customizations. This "issue" was easily worked around hence the lowest priority. I believe that this proposed solution is appropriate enough to close this issue. However, without going into too much detail, I don't think this would work for us since our overlay is created before the drcsim package is built.
